Articles.Content: Hello everybody, my names is Flemmard (like lazyguy in english), i'm french and i play KSP since 4 years and i've created a corporation named "Flem-Ex" ! Flem-Ex is a brand of the "CSP" (Corporation Stellaire primordiale)  and it product many vehicles like planes, station and ground vehicles (with many clipped stock parts). If you want to see a preview of this, you can search my videos in youtube with the following link: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCYcV_1DRQph9QUcMK8vupzA .
Welcome to our forum, with your fancy and occasionally physics-defying aircraft.
